pages.text: Requirements: $(li)Altar is at or below 32 height, not expose to sky $(br)$(l)OR$()$() $(li)1 Smithing Table $(li)8 Blocks of Amethyst $(li)16 Deepslate Blocks
An example of how the ritual can be placed.
Placing the Altar deep beneath and surrounding it with deepslate and amethysts, you will be able to harness the earth to create all kinds of jewels and magics.
